mapper.insert: insert into PROMISES (GROUP_ID, TITLE, PROMISE_DATE, PROMISE_ID) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{title}, #{promiseDate}, (select count(*) + 1 from PROMISES p where p.GROUP_ID = #{groupId}))
mapper.select: select * from PROMISES where GROUP_ID in (select GROUP_MEMBERS.GROUP_ID from GROUP_MEMBERS where GROUP_MEMBERS.USER_ID = #{userId})
